books.title: Killing Floor
books.summary: Jack Reacher investigates a murder in the small town of Margrave, Georgia.

books.title: Die Trying
books.summary: Reacher and a woman are kidnapped and must uncover the conspiracy behind their abduction.

books.title: Tripwire
books.summary: Reacher is drawn into a dangerous investigation involving his mentor's daughter.

books.title: Running Blind
books.summary: Reacher investigates a series of unsettling messages left for women who end up murdered.

books.title: Echo Burning
books.summary: Reacher becomes entangled in a small Texan community's dark secrets.
